title: COMPLETELY RENOVATED-CONDO FINISHES-TOP FLOOR-OPEN KITCHEN-CLOSETS
posting_body: ['Location, Location, Location!!!', 'If the perfect combination of modern luxury and Tribica south prime location is what you seek, come experience the ultimate Manhattan lifestyle in this unique grand two bedroom that FEATURES:', 'Endless Circulating Purified Air, High ceilings, Bamboo wood floors, State-of-the-art open kitchen, Natural-Stone Countertops,including stainless steel appliances, dish washer, Large Closets in every room, microwave, sound proof windows, uv lights, marble on suite bathrooms in each room, Rain drop shower heads.', 'Extra-large windows to enhance the incomparable views.', 'Located in a Eco friendly luxury high rise in Tribica South.', 'The featured AMENITIES include: 24-hour Concierge, Bicycle Storage, , Fitness Center, Garage, Landscaped Rooftop , Pet Friendly, Storage, Washer and dryer, Valet, dry cleaning, in house cleaning, Wi-Fi .', 'UTILITIES INCLUDED IN THE RENT EXCEPT ELECTRIC .']
